Education.Institution: Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology College

Experience.Responsibilities: Worked on developing scalable products, collaborating with team members.

Projects.Name: CPU Scheduling Algorithm Visualizer
Projects.Description: An interactive platform simulating various CPU scheduling algorithms, including FCFS, SJF, RR, SRTF, and Priority. It allows users to input data and visualize scheduling processes in real-time.

Projects.Name: Chatbot for College Website
Projects.Description: Developed using Python, designed to assist students and visitors by answering queries and providing information using NLP.
